11.title: Zig Zag

111.content: how does zig zag become a giantess?
111.title: how?

1112.content:
'Just another day at the office' zig zag thought as she sat behind her desk and went through the company mail. Zig zag loved her company and loved the work even more but she couldn't help but start to feel bored with doing the same thing day in, day out. even teasing Sabrina was starting to get boring.

'I need something to spice things up around here' she thought, as she went through the mail she took metal notes of what each letter was and sorted accordingly, that is until she came across a envelope with a very curious return address, a laboratory across town that specialized in cosmetics. it read:

Dear miss zig zag

we hope this letter finds you well, we would like to invite you or one of your employees to visit our lab and help test our latest experiment, a body modification ray, the purpose of which we hope will allow people to achieve the body of their dreams. we contact you as we are well aware of how important physical appearance is to a pornographic film star. with this ray we could give woman enormous breasts and buttocks without the need for cosmetic surgery, give men penises the size of their arms and bigger.

please call us if you are interested. sincerely Professor Raindash

Zig Zag looked at the letter, 'This does sound interesting, but i am relatively happy with the way my body is, should i call them?'
1112.title: Mysterious e-mail

113.content:
It was just after closing time at ZZ Studios, and Zigzag was going over a few of the next scripts for her upcoming shoots. Having just finished a shoot before the close of the day, the tiger-striped skunk was wearing a fuzzy robe, and nothing much else. She tapped a pencil against the pages as she made a few last minute revisions to the scripts, and smiled at some of the dialogue. How cheesy could you get!?

At a few of the lines, Zig actually laughed. God this stuff was terrible. She took the pencil and furiously went to work, making correction after correction, sometimes even editing out entire lines.

Then she stopped. Her ears perked up, and she thought for a moment she heard something. She was the last person to leave, and Tina usually locked the doors, since she knew she was the last one out. Zig tightened her robe a bit, and stepped out of the room to look around. "Hello?" she called out, and there was no answer. "Hearing things." she said, and returned to her chair to finish her work. A few minutes later, she heard something again, only this time it sounded like someone calling out her name. Then she felt something touch her foot, and she nearly jumped. "Please, don't be a spider." Zig thought, as she looked down at the ground. There... by her foot, was a tiny little fur. Hardly a few inches tall, probably. Upon closer inspection, Zig saw that it was...
113.title: Someone else shrinks and she finds him/her

1133.content: (Apologies for the branch chapter, but it gives other writers chances to play too)
1133.title: A new hire (Original characters)

11331.content:
Zig Zag looked down at the ground, and next to her foot was the tiniest little minkette she ever saw. Her mouth was slightly agape as she looked at how tiny this little woman was.

"Hey, Miss Z. I was trying to get a hold of you all day. I'd have called but my cellphone died, and well, charging it is a pain in the tail. Rebecca Madison." She said, offering up a tiny hand. "I was supposed to audition tomorrow."

Zig blinked, then reached down and held out a single finger for the diminutive lady to shake, then held her hand flat so she could jump in. Zig brought her hand up to about chest level, which inadvertently gave Rebecca a great view. Rebecca giggled, but said nothing as she looked upwards towards Zig's face.

"You know, Miss Madison, your application didn't say anything about you being..." Zig sized her up, "... about three inches tall." Rebecca smiled, "I mentioned I was extra petite, and I included a photo." but Zig shook her head slightly, "That looked photoshopped." Zig said, defending. Rebecca just shook her head, smiling. "Look.. you liked what you saw, just give me a chance." and to that, Zig smiled. "Sure, so, tell me about yourself?"

Rebecca giggled on Zig's palm, "Well, I'm just under three inches tall and..." and Zig gave a wide smile, "I can see that." The two of them shared a giggle, and then Rebecca continued, "And before you ask, I don't rightly know how I wound up so small, and even if I did... I don't think it's right to tell others. I mean, if the wrong person found out, it could be a lot of trouble for everyone else."

Zig gave a nod, "I can respect that." mostly cause she saw, in an instant, all the people who made her life hell about that small.

"I graduated high school by mail. Correspondence courses mostly. Took me a while, cause those keys are hard to hit." the tiny mink said with a smile. "I live with a friend, Jennifer, and we make money off of the web. We ... have something of a fetish website. She takes pictures of me, mostly nudes, interacting with ordinary stuff. I'd be soaking in a tea cup, or using a pencil as a dance pole." she explained, Zig watching her and listening to her every word. "We'd do about a hundred shots, pick the best twenty or so, and then put them up on a few sites for sale. Twenty shots, ten bucks for the bundle, and tons of people out there buying them up like hotcakes." Rebecca said, a smile on her face.

"How'd you make out?" Zig asked, and Rebecca giggled, "Carefully. I was always afraid she was going to swallow me."

Zig paused, then gave a laugh, "No no no, not like that... I meant how'd you make out SALE wise?" and now it was Rebecca's turn to laugh. "Oh, oh I thought... cause we worked with me n... oh wow. Awkward..." the little mink composed herself, "We cleared the rent, covered the bills, cleared the credit cards... porn sells." she said, "Course, you're the queen of porn, so I really don't have to tell you that." She paused, then gave a mock-curtsey towards the towering skunkette, ".. Your majesty."

Zig smiled.

"We save a fortune on clothes, since I can just wear doll clothing, and my half..." she giggled, "...of the apartment is a really kick ass dollhouse in the living room, though I have a summer home in the bedroom. Good part about doll clothes is they're kinda durable and easy to slip on and off. Downside is no undergarments for dolls, so I'm either forced to tie some silk scraps from the fabric store down under, or resign myself to go commando." she explained. "No panties, eh?" Zig said with a smile. "Kinky." to which Rebecca just grinned, and turned to pat her own smooth rear, "Kinky as hell, hon."

Zig gave a smile, "So what's the kinkiest thing you've ever done?" and Rebecca didn't even bat an eye, "Kinkiest? Well, it was during a game of Truth or Dare... you know, where all the really well thought out life experiences happen. Well, we were all a little drunk, and when Jennifer said Truth, she admitted she had a crush on me. So on a dare, I... I went inside her."

"Inside? I thought you were afraid of being swallowed." Zig asked, a little concerned. Rebecca gave a nod, then pointed down. "Other lips, hon." and Zig got it, her smile only widened. "Was it something you enjoyed? Would you consider doing it again?" the tiger-striped skunkette asked as she fidgeted in her seat. This tiny little mink was starting to warm Zig up, and some of the thoughts this little lady was providing were doing the rest. Rebecca almost blushed, "I... I did enjoy it, yeah. And... I wouldn't mind doing it again BUT... whoever it is, they have to be careful." the tiny mink paused, "And cute as hell." Zig smiled, approvingly before she licked her lips a little, "So... what was it like? Inside Jennifer..."

"Hot, very hot, and a little slick and gooie, really... but I didn't mind. Everywhere I touched, she moved. I could hear her heartbeat, her every breath, her every moan Zig I tell you... I'd say it's something everyone should know. Being that close to someone, being a part of them... literally... where every move you make, even the smallest gesture, can drive someone to ecstasy." Rebecca recounted, now a little flush herself. "It was wonderful."

It took a few minutes for Zig to compose herself. It had gotten awfully hot in here... "I think you're going to fit in just fine around here, Miss Madison. Can I call you Rebecca?" and the mink nodded, "Sure can.. and I looking forward to fitting in." Rebecca said with a lewd grin on her tiny face, a grin that was not missed by Zig as she gave the matter some thought, and as she did she loosened the top of her robe a little more. Rebecca smiled, "Hey, stop showing off. Those damn things are probably bigger then ME."

Zig smiled, "I want to see that." and she moved down to rest her breasts against the table, now taking off the robe. Rebecca could only stare at a pair of breasts that were, indeed, bigger then her tiny body. Zig smiled, then brought her hand up from chest level to eye level, "That outfit won't do, Miss Madison. If you're going to try to fondle my tits, hon, I get to see yours." She said, in a whisper.

Rebecca blinked, then smiled, and started to take off her top. "Whoa whoa..." Zig said in a hush... "Slower." and Rebecca smiled, a strip show... to the giant audience of Zig Zag. "If you can't handle me, then Sheila will probably hurt you. Who am I kidding.... Sheila's probably going to LOSE you down her top." The skunkette smiled, watching the tiny mink shed her clothes. For a tiny little thing, she had an amazing figure. Curves, and form. A nice round bottom, and a decent pair of tits. Shame that Zig could cover them both with just her thumb. "So what's your preference? Guys? Girls? Both?" and Rebecca smiled "I prefer girls, Miss Z. Guys can be competitive with their lengths, especially when they can compare it to someone as Longer then she is Tall." and Zig could only nod. As she removed the final article of her clothing. True to her word, no bra... and no panties. Zig took her free hand and removed Rebecca's clothing from the pile on her palm and with a devilish grin, stuffed the doll clothing deep into her cleavage. "Hey! No fair." Rebecca said, though her concern didn't quite extend all the way into her voice.

"Want them back?" Zig said with a playful smile, "Well then, let's see what you can do." Zig said as she gently brought the tiny mink...

131.content: OK, so how does she grow?
131.title: Huge kitty giantess!

choices: Her clothes are destroyed by the growth
1312.content:
Some scientists use their abilities for a pretty odd purpose: they offered a good amount of money to whoever accepted to try a special serum that could enlarge someone's breasts in a few seconds. Darke Katt, the janitor of the ZZ studios, was already proud of her bosom, but the reward was still kinda tempting, and even if in the end her breast was too big they apparently had an antidote already (or at least a prototype).
So the black cat girl was already in the lab, and one of the scientists, a bear, was giving her a test tube with the serum. "Cheers" she said with her usual sarcastic tone. She drank it...
"Hah! It doesn't work, you amateurs!" Darke said after more than one minute of nothing. The doctor started stammering: "I... I... I don't understand... we paid attention to every single detail..." Darke interrupted him: "Well, not even science can win them all. Now I guess you told me that I was going to have the money anyw..." she abruptly fell silent and changed expression: she suddenly looked like she was feeling a sharp pain in her stomach, also kinda scared.
The scientist tried to ask her: "What's wrong, miss Katt?" Then he tried to call for some other doctors to help her, meanwhile Darke cried in pain: "You dorks! What the heck did you make me drink!?" And then, it happened.
Darke started to grow. At first it was rather slow, but soon it became much faster, she kept growing and growing, she was likely becoming the most gigantic being on Earth! Her huge body easily destroyed the ceiling and her feet were starting to be bigger than the room! It didn't work as the scientists expected, but still something no one had seen before was happening, much to their amazement.
1312.title: A "failed" experiment

choices: Darke goes to the city for some rampage!
She visits her companions at the ZZ studios...
13121.content:
Darke's clothes were completely ripped by her growth, her body was totally exposed. At first, when she started regaining consciousness, Darke was highly upset by her nudity and, first of all, by that absurd situation: she was incredibly huge, what remained of the laboratory was like a doll house at her feet and the scientists (who were immobilized by fear and astonishment) were like tiny puppets.
Not so slowly, Darke started to like it: she was gargantuan, nothing could stop her, and why feeling embarrassed about her nudity, she had a beautiful body and anyone who dared teasing her was going to be... stepped on... or eaten alive... or something even more humiliating... and "dirty"... now Darke wasn't afraid or shocked anymore, she was just excited, and on her naughty yet lovely muzzle there was a large smirk; the scientists didn't like it at all and they actually started to go crazy and scream and run in panic and confusion.
Darke's massive hand came down and grabbed the bear scientist who gave her the serum with her thumb and index finger. The poor guy kept going up, and up, and up until he could see his reflection in Darke's feline pupils.
The giantess whispered: "You know little one, I've just changed my mind: sorry if I use a pretty clichéd joke, but your expurriment was just purrfect."
The little bear she was holding tried to be rational and said: "Please miss Katt, let's try to be serious now! You remember we have what might be the antidote, right? We can try to use it!" But, with the wretch's greatest terror, Darke calmly answered: "Not a chance."
And the scientist was even more scared when the cat showed her tongue and slowly licked him. "I've never tasted bear meat. Guess there is always a first time." she said mischievously. And with a slow movement she put the unlucky doctor in her jaws and started to chew, enjoying the screaming inside of her mouth. She swallowed and licked her lips, it tasted surprisingly good.
The gigantic cat girl took a step. It made a loud thud and the ground trembled. Darke loved it. And the screaming below was just priceless. She took another step... and felt one of those puny tiny people being squashed under her foot. "Oops!" she chuckled.
Darke stepped out of the building. She saw some cars... yeah, it was time to do something that every giant or giantess must do sooner or later: she stepped on it. It felt so good, it made a crunchy sound and it wasn't too hard, it was a little like trampling a beetle, but less gross and way more exciting! She flexed the toes of the foot that was still on the destroyed car, then she stroked it with the other foot, purring. She could also feel her nipples being erected.
Darke stepped forward and looked at the footprint she left. It looked beautiful with that purrfectly flattened car inside of it.
The feline giantess wondered what she could do next with her new, incredible life...
13121.title: Beware the naked cat giantess!

1513.title: Other

info.brief_description: Shrink or enlarge your favorite characters from this great furry webcomic.
info.description:
Well guys, after months of no writing at all, here I am. And this time I felt like trying to start a story that nobody wrote before and that really HAS to exist in mah humble opinion.
This is a macrophile interactive story espacially aimed at furries (please know that even if you're not a furry you're still welcome, as long as you write good chapters), and here you can choose your favorite character from the webcomic Sabrina Online and either shrink her/him or turn her/him into a giantess/giant.

RULES:
No shit fetish, no piss fetish, no farts fetish.

Lastly in case you don't know Sabrina Online, here's the link to its website:
http://www.sabrina-online.com/

And here are some links to know how some of the main characters look like (I haven't written Sabrina's name because you can see her almost everywhere in the strips below).

Zig Zag:
http://www.sabrina-online.com/strips/SabOnline81.GIF
http://www.sabrina-online.com/strips/SabOnline83.GIF
http://www.sabrina-online.com/2010-04.html

Amy the Squirrel:
http://www.sabrina-online.com/1996-01.html (here you can see Thomas Woolfe too)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8Yh8_rfTMQ

Darke Katt:
http://www.coolchaser.us/l/preview/34978180
http://www.keywordpicture.com/keyword/darke%20katt/ (Click on the fourth picture to see it)

Sheila Vixen:
http://uk.gamespot.com/users/aaron1111/view_image?id=a9UN4BV37hma5hjmlw
http://www.furafterdark.com/toursheila.html
http://www.sabrina-online.com/strips/SabOnline568.GIF

Well, have fun.
And I know some of you will rate this one star immediately. Well, do what you want, this is a democracy after all.
